team.name: Imran Ali
team.description: A qualified Prince II Practitioner who has minimum 10 yearsâ€™ experience in a senior management role with both external audit and in-house financial management experience gained in high-growth organisations including Citibank, National Health Service and UK and foreign government institutions.

team.name: Dr. Priyantha Wijeooriya
team.description: Dr.Priyantha Wijesooriya is a US and Sri Lanka trained energy engineer (B.Sc and M.S in Energy Engineering, PhD in Resource Economics & Inter-generational Equities). He is a Rotary Foundation Scholar to the University of Massachusetts and has been pioneering Renewable Energy Projects and Sustainable Development for years.

team.name: Sajid Salih
team.description: Having past experience in corporate finance, project management, eCommerce and mobile platforms with startups since 2016.

team.name: Prof. Atula Senaratne
team.description: Prof. Atula Senaratne holds a B.Sc. degree in Geology from the University of Peradeniya, Sri Lanka and a M.Sc. degree in Environmental Technology from the Imperial College of Science, Technology and Medicine, University of London. He obtained his Ph.D. Degree from the Johannes Gutenberg University of Mainz, Federal Republic of Germany.

team.name: Iftikhar Bokhari
team.description: Over 25 years of experience in project management and a recognized track record of delivering multi million pound contracts for urban regeneration and project engineering within the UK. Specializing on energy from waste systems, integration of renewable technologies for domestic and commercial applications, research and strategic planning.

team.name: Graham Walwyn
team.description: Senior Project Engineer - specializing in electrical design, costing and procurement. Worked on a range of multi million pound developments which range from medical, commercial and domestic systems. Also specializing in the design,installation and maintenance of renewable energy technology.

team.name: Prof. Waqar Ahmed
team.description: Over 30 years of industrial and academic experience in engineering and science. Leads the Experimental Nano physics Group focusing on Renewable Energy Technology and Sustainability. Accredited with over 500 publications on a range of engineering and science journals and has worked across many projects throughout Europe, Middle East, USA and Asia.

team.name: Aaron Bernhardt
team.description: Full-stack engineer with experience in JavaScript - jQuery, bootstrap, and Infragistics, HTML, C#/ASP.NET - MVC architecture, LINQ library, building models, controllers, and views using the above languages; Dependency Injection, Entity Framework SQL (T-SQL). Python.
